summary: Phase 1 features testing completed successfully. All 16 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all features working: health endpoint, admin user CRUD with password display, admin order CRUD with edit/delete, product cross-reference search with 'Exact Match' and 'Possible Replacements' sections, and cross_articles field in product form.

backend_api: POST /api/auth/login - Admin login works with admin@avarus.ru
GET /api/admin/users - Lists all users with password_plain visible
POST /api/admin/users - Creates new user with password stored
PUT /api/admin/orders/{id} - Updates order status and details
Cross-reference search for SACHS-001 returns DAF-GS-004 in alternatives
frontend_ui: Admin panel loads with all tabs visible
Orders tab shows orders with view/edit/delete buttons
Users tab shows users with edit/delete buttons
Add User modal has password field
Edit User modal shows current password (password_plain)
Products tab shows products with edit/delete buttons
Catalog search for SACHS-001 shows 'Возможные замены' section
DAF-GS-004 found in alternatives with cross_articles displayed
Catalog search for DAF-GS-004 shows exact match

seed_data_creation: Test users created during testing were cleaned up
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 features all working: 1) /api/health returns {status: healthy}, 2) Admin user CRUD with password_plain display in edit modal, 3) Admin order CRUD with edit/delete buttons, 4) Cross-reference search shows 'Возможные замены' section when searching by cross_articles, 5) Product form has 'КРОСС-НОМЕРА (АНАЛОГИ)' textarea field. DAF-GS-004 product has cross_articles: 'SACHS-001, BPW-123, MANN-456'.
